Title: Search for flights
Steps: Open flight booking system | Enter source | Enter destination | Select date | Click search
Expected: Available flights are displayed with prices and seat classes

Title: Select a flight
Steps: Search for flights | Choose a flight from the list | Select seat class | Click book

Title: Book a flight
Steps: Select a flight | Choose a seat | Enter passenger details | Enter payment information | Click confirm booking
Expected: Payment is processed and booking confirmation is displayed

Title: Payment failure handling
Steps: Select a flight | Choose a seat | Enter passenger details | Enter invalid payment information | Click confirm booking
Expected: Error message is displayed and option to retry payment is available

Title: Successful payment confirmation
Steps: Select a flight | Choose a seat | Enter passenger details | Enter valid payment information | Click confirm booking
Expected: Booking confirmation email is sent to the user

Title: Display flight details
Steps: Search for flights | Select a flight
Expected: Flight details including price and seat class are displayed

Title: Retry payment after failure
Steps: Select a flight | Choose a seat | Enter passenger details | Enter invalid payment information | Click confirm booking | Enter valid payment information | Click confirm booking
Expected: Payment is processed successfully and booking confirmation is displayed
